title: Arrow Pulse
summary: Tap or press arrow keys in time with the beat as minimalist arrows approach the hit line. Four lanes, clean visuals, and a short, self-contained track are generated on the fly. Includes on-screen buttons for mobile, optional sound beeps, and a reduced-motion mode that replaces scrolling with subtle flashes.

title: Sprout Sprint
summary: Dash as a tiny sprout in an endless runner where the ground keeps rolling and rocks keep coming. Tap or press Space to jump (double-jump allowed) and survive as speed ramps up. High contrast, keyboard-friendly, and respects reduced motion, with your best score saved locally.
